content:
Set Up Work Summaries

Follow a few simple steps to create concise summaries and save agentsâ€™ time.

Available in: Lightning Experience, Enterprise, and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Service add-on

To use Work Summaries in Copilot, first Set Up Einstein Copilot.

Enable Work Summaries
Turn on Work Summaries.
Show Work Summaries for Enhanced Messaging
Add a quick action that stores the generated summary, map it to Salesforce object fields, and activate work summaries for messaging sessions.
Show Work Summaries for Voice
Add the Wrap Up component, map the generated outputs, and activate work summaries for calls.
Show Work Summaries for Email
Have Einstein predict and fill conversation summaries for case-associated emails, add the Email Summaries component, and activate work summaries for emails.
Show Work Summaries for Live Chat
Set up case field mapping, add the Wrap Up component to the Live Chat Transcript page, and activate work summaries for chats.
Show Agents and Supervisors Midconversation Summaries
Catch them up with a real-time AI-generated summary of the conversation when they join an active voice call or messaging session.
Give Agents Access to Work Summaries
Assign a permission set to give agents access to Work Summaries.
title: Setting Up Work Summaries in Salesforce Service Cloud
